tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DeviceLocation (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceStatus (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  status_code INT,
  status_message TEXT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Room (
  room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(50),
  room_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE device_status_history (
	event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	device_id UUID NOT NULL,
	event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	status BOOLEAN,
	FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_home_devices(device_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Location (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), city VARCHAR(50), country VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE Device (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), type VARCHAR(50), status VARCHAR(20), location_id INT) REFERENCES Location(id)
CREATE TABLE TemperatureSensor (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), sensor_type VARCHAR(50), temperature FLOAT, location_id INT) REFERENCES Location(id)
CREATE TABLE LightSwitch (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), is_on BOOLEAN, location_id INT) REFERENCES Location(id)
CREATE TABLE Camera (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), resolution VARCHAR(20), is_recording BOOLEAN, location_id INT) REFERENCES Location(id)
